tgt_original: upāyo buddhādiviṣaye śraddhā |  dānādau vīryam |  kalyāṇakāmatādeḥ smaraṇam |  karmakartṛkriyā'  nupalambhaśca samādhiḥ |

prāgvacanāt prajñāpāramitācaryayaiva ṣaṭpāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchantītyarthaḥ |  iha tu granthasaṃkṣepasyābhipretatvādupalakṣaṇatvena pratyekaṃ dānādipāramitācaryayāpi ṣaḍeva pāramitā bhāvanāniṣpatiṃ pratipadyanta ityavagantavyam
animittālambanajñānākāreṇa dānādisarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ svasantāne prādurbhāvāt samudāgame kartavye yat kauśalaṃ prajñāpāramitopāyalakṣaṇaṃ,
tadasmin sarvākārābhisambodhe mokṣabhāgīyamiṣṭam |  mokṣo'tra visaṃyogaviśeṣastadbhāgahitatvānmokṣabhāgīyaṃ prathamataḥ sarvākārābhisambodhātmake śāsane'
"iha subhūte bodhisattvasya dānaṃ dadataḥ sattveṣu maitraṃ kāyavāṅmanaskarma pratyupasthitaṃ bhavatyevaṃ śīlapāramitā |
tasyaiva ca taddānaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayataḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmivikṣepacittābhāvena dhyānapāramitā |
tato bīryabalena kāyacittaprasrabdhimāsādayati |  tataḥ prasrabdhakāyacetasaḥ kausīdyaṃ vyāvartate |

etaduktaṃ bhavati |  sarveṇaitena samādhivibandhakakāyaklamathādyutpādaniṣedhenopalakṣaṇatayā sarvasyaiva samādheḥ |  ṣaddoṣāṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇāṣṭābhiḥ prahāṇasaṃskāraiḥ samanvāgatena samādhinā prajñāpāramitāṃ manasi kurvan pūrvāṃ diśaṃ gacchaivaṃ śroṣyasītyavavādo dattaḥ syāt |
tathāhi samādhiguṇeṣṭhabhisampratyayalakṣaṇayā yogina śraddhayā chandaḥ samutpadyate |
